main.title: X6000 High-Density Server
main.text: The X6000 High-Density Server is a 2U, 4-node high-density server powered by Huawei 64-bit Kunpeng Hi1616 processors that can accommodate up to four XR320 2-socket server nodes.
bottomTip1: Move the mouse to rotate the model
bottomTip2: Move the mouse to move the model
bottomTip3: Move the mouse to zoom in or out the model
chassis_node: Universal chassis：86.1 mm x 436 mm x 805 mm (3.39 in. x 17.17 in. x 31.69 in.)</br>Super chassis： 86.1 mm x 436 mm x 819 mm (3.39 in. x 17.17 in. x 32.24 in.)
node_node: Up to 4 XR320 servers with X6000 universal chassis or 4 XA320 V2 servers with X6000 super chassis
power_node: 2 x 1,500W enhanced hot-swappable AC PSUs for XR320 server nodes</br>2 x 3,000W hot-swappable AC PSUs for XA320 V2 server nodes</br>supporting 1+1 redundancy
fan_node: 4 hot-swappable fan modules in N+1 redundancy
disk_node: Up to 6 x 2.5-inch SAS/SATA drives or SSDs or NVMe SSDs per Node
